tool_description: The MMA Stats API can be used to retrieve information about UFC  fighters Statistics ,previous & upcoming fights, or to search for past fights involving specific fighters.
title: MMA Stats

api_list.name: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green ( October 07, 2023)
api_list.description:
**UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green**.    
  .Access a range of information about each fighter, including their win-loss record, height, weight, reach, and age. results of a particular fight or a fighter's win-loss record.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com/October_07_2023"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com/June_10_2023"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: search fighter stats
api_list.description: The search functionality provided helps you find fighter statistics and UFC/MMA history based on their names. It compares your search criteria with the fighters' information and returns a list of fighters that match all the specified criteria, including their statistics, averages, titles, wins, losses, and more.

api_list.name: search fighter stats by age
api_list.description: The search functionality provided helps you find fighter statistics and UFC/MMA history based on their age. It compares your search criteria with the fighters' information and returns a list of fighters that match all the specified criteria, including their statistics, averages, titles, wins, losses, and more.
